biz.source_code.dsp.swing

Class FunctionPlot.SimplePlotFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.source_code.dsp.swing.FunctionPlot.SimplePlotFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FunctionPlot.PlotFunction
    Enclosing class:
    FunctionPlot

    public abstract static class FunctionPlot.SimplePlotFunction
extends Object
implements FunctionPlot.PlotFunction
    A convenience class for implementing the PlotFunction interface. The only method that has to be implemented is getY().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimplePlotFunction()
      Constructs a plot function without inter-pixel sampling.
      SimplePlotFunction(int interPixelSamples)
      Constructs a plot function.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FunctionPlot.GridLine[] getHorizontalGridLines(double yMin, double yMax)
      Returns the definition of the horizontal grid lines for the current view.
      double[] getMinMaxY(double x1, double x2)
      Returns a double[2] array with the minimum and maximum y values within the function range x1 to x2.
      FunctionPlot.GridLine[] getVerticalGridLines(double xMin, double xMax)
      Returns the definition of the vertical grid lines for the current view.
      abstract double getY(double x)
      Returns an y value for an x value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimplePlotFunction

        public SimplePlotFunction()
        Constructs a plot function without inter-pixel sampling.

      • SimplePlotFunction

        public SimplePlotFunction(int interPixelSamples)
        Constructs a plot function.
        Parameters:
        interPixelSamples - Number of inter-pixel samples to be computed on each genMinMayY() call. 0 for no inter-pixel sampling.

    • Method Detail

      • getY

        public abstract double getY(double x)
        Returns an y value for an x value. This method is abstract and must be overridden by the derived class.

      • getMinMaxY

        public double[] getMinMaxY(double x1,
                           double x2)
        Description copied from interface: FunctionPlot.PlotFunction
        Returns a double[2] array with the minimum and maximum y values within the function range x1 to x2. May return null if no values are available.
        Specified by:
        getMinMaxY in interface FunctionPlot.PlotFunction

      • getHorizontalGridLines

        public FunctionPlot.GridLine[] getHorizontalGridLines(double yMin,
                                                      double yMax)
        Description copied from interface: FunctionPlot.PlotFunction
        Returns the definition of the horizontal grid lines for the current view. May return null for no horizontal grid lines.
        Specified by:
        getHorizontalGridLines in interface FunctionPlot.PlotFunction
        Parameters:
        yMin - Minimum y value of the current view.
        yMax - Maximum y value of the current view.

      • getVerticalGridLines

        public FunctionPlot.GridLine[] getVerticalGridLines(double xMin,
                                                    double xMax)
        Description copied from interface: FunctionPlot.PlotFunction
        Returns the definition of the vertical grid lines for the current view. May return null for no vertical grid lines.
        Specified by:
        getVerticalGridLines in interface FunctionPlot.PlotFunction
        Parameters:
        xMin - Minimum x value of the current view.
        xMax - Maximum x value of the current view.
